landing.simplify_your_accounts: Simplify your accounts, simplify your life
landing.your_best_friend: Your best friend to keep your accounts clear
landing.makes_it_easy: Red First makes it easy for people to plan their daily accounts while keeping larger goals in sight.
landing.hasBoostedWorkflowAbility: Red First has boosted my workflow. The ability to maintain visibility of the most important milestones at all times keeps you motivated.
landing.weHaveBeenAbleCancel: We have been able to cancel many subscriptions since using Red First. There is no longer confusion between my accounts and everyone is much clearer.
landing.hasBoostedMyAccountsAbility: Red First has boosted my accounts. The ability to maintain visibility of the most important milestones at all times keeps me motivated.
landing.setEstimatesForYourAccounts: Set estimates for your accounts and track progress toward your goals. Our customizable dashboard helps you create the reports you need.
landing.everythingYouNeedOnePlace: Everything you need in one place
landing.stopJumpingFromOneService: Stop jumping from one service to another to take care of your money, do accounts, track and clearly keep track of your expenses. Red First offers a productivity solution.
landing.trackTheProgressOfAll: Track the progress of all your accounts
landing.seeHowYourDailyAccountsFitInto: See how your daily accounts fit into a bigger picture. Go from tracking progress at the milestone level to the smallest detail. Don't lose sight of the big picture again.
landing.manageProvidesAllTheFunctionality: Manage provides all the functionality your team needs, without the complexity. Our software is tailor-made for modern digital product teams.
